title: Kuoni Destination Management wins World Travel Awards honour for third year in a rowTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Kuoni Destination Management wins World Travel Awards honour for third year in a row Published on : Monday, September 7, 2015
Kuoni Destination Management has been voted by travel professionals worldwide as Europe’s Leading Destination Management Company in the World Travel Awards for the third consecutive year. The best travel and tourism partners were announced at a ceremony in Sardinia, Italy this weekend.
Steve Barker, Senior Vice President for Kuoni’s Destination Management in Europe, said: “Kuoni Destination Management is very proud to win this accolade, which recognises our commitment to excellence for our customers. Our reputation and ability to create and execute imaginative meetings, incentive programmes, congresses and business events (MICE) of all kinds has seen our business grow from strength to strength.
“We are very grateful that the creative solutions and dedicated local teams of Kuoni Destination Management and our German sister company, Conference & Touring, continue to be appreciated and recognised by our travel and tourism partners.”
Kuoni Destination Management and Conference & Touring are significantly investing in their systems and people in destinations. Their local destination specialists offer a wealth of knowledge from tailor-made event proposals and concepts, comprehensive logistics and accommodation management to extensive PCO and non-PCO congress and convention management solutions.
Businesses continue to partner with both companies because of their destination skills and experience, which support the making of memorable occasions and experiences for their employees and customers. Kuoni’s MICE business for 2015/16 continues to grow with a number of exciting partnerships and projects ahead.
